/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings and the clear blue sky. The buildings, painted in hues of red and white, stand tall and proud, their facades adorned with vibrant advertisements that add a splash of color to the cityscape. The street below is a hive of activity, with cars and buses navigating their way through the urban jungle. The sun shines brightly in the background, casting long shadows and bathing the scene in a warm glow.
